body: @dachuan9e can you help me ?

Hi @CrackerSuperior ,`acct_retn_evt_c_lxy` belongs to the logical table in the sharding rules. You can use `show sharding table rules`. For details, please refer to  [RQL](https://shardingsphere.apache.org/document/current/cn/concepts/distsql/syntax/rql/rql-sharding-rule/), I wonder if it can solve your problem?

When we use 
`select count(distinct a),sum(b) from table`
in sharding.
We'll get actual sql like `select distinct a,sum(b) from table_1`, Then it'll execute error.
So, This sql `select count(distinct a),sum(b) from table` is not supported by sharding.
This issue is not related to `coalesce` function.
